flawed_nl_solution:
There are 25 + 30 members = <<25+30=55>>55 members in the first two groups.
This means the third group has 70 total members - 55 members in the first two groups = <<70-55=51>>51 members.
#### 51

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
